quote: A sensibility that wails almost exclusively over the enemies of liberty seems suspect to me. Stop shaking the tyrant's bloody robe in my face, or I will believe that you wish to put Rome in chains.
quote_letters: A SENSIBILITY THAT WAILS ALMOST EXCLUSIVELY OVER THE ENEMIES OF LIBERTY SEEMS SUSPECT TO ME STOP SHAKING THE TYRANTS BLOODY ROBE IN MY FACE OR I WILL BELIEVE THAT YOU WISH TO PUT ROME IN CHAINS
